Articles.Content: hey has anyone played empire at war. It's a really good game for star wars fans anyway whenever I think of space two things come to my mind ksp and empire at war. but anyway if you have played empire at war please say so and tell me your favorite features.

I remember that game. It was basically my childhood. My favorite feature was that when you were in the endgame in galactic conquest you could have fleets of up to 30 star destroyers if you managed your forces well.
I still have the big box ,and with the CD still around.The first PC game I have ever played when I was only a mere 7 year old.
I still occasionally go back to it. It never really gets old because few star wars games of space battles on such awesome levels.

my favorite feature is that I an have a bunch of star destroyers and own rebels

random rebel:

hey stop owning us with star destroyers

me:

sorry I can't hear over me owning you with star destroyers
